message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%. A fair deal considering the inflation working against me.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  Let's meet in the middle. How about a 55/45 split?
I understand you want a larger share, Bob, but I need to be mindful of the inflation. 58/42 is my final offer.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice.  I'm willing to compromise a little more, but you need to move as well.  52/48 is my final offer.
